metadata.title: CVE-2023-5972 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A null pointer dereference flaw was found in the nft_inner.c functionalityof netfilter in the Linux kernel. This issue could allow a local user tocrash the system or escalate their privileges on the system.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
